original_text:
Then someone said to Saul, “Look, the men are sinning against the Lord by eating meat that has blood in it.”
“You have broken faith,” he said. “Roll a large stone over here at once.”
korean_text: 무리가 사울에게 전하여 이르되 보소서 백성이 고기를 피째 먹어 여호와께 범죄하였나이다 사울이 이르되 너희가 믿음 없이 행하였도다 이제 큰 돌을 내게로 굴려 오라 하고

sentences.original_text: Look, the men are sinning against the Lord
by eating meat that has blood in it
Roll a large stone over here at once
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 당장 여기에 큰 돌을 굴려오세요
